pages.text: As described in the $(l:creating/on_generating)On Creating Aura$() section, most $(thing)creational devices$() lack the ability to create $(aura) beyond a certain point. The $(item)Creational Catalyst$() easily solves this problem: Placing it directly below any creational device will cause its limit to be lifted, making it able to generate $(aura) far beyond the previously mentioned point.$(br)This comes at no cost in return.
